summary: Horses will no longer cry out in pain outside of combat/from fall damage.
descriptionHtml:
Irritated with your horse constantly making noise from even the smallest amount of fall damage when just riding around and trying to enjoy the scenery? This mod is for you.

This fix was made in 5 minutes. I added an IsInCombat check to the NPCHorseInjured sound - bam, no more pain noises for horses outside of combat.Â 

Installation: Drop the .esp in your data folder and activate it in your launcher of choice.
author: th3r
